name: pnp-devproxy-api-usage-analytics
title: Track API usage analytics
shortDescription: Demonstrates how to use Dev Proxy to track and analyze API usage patterns, showing which endpoints are used most frequently with reports in plain text, JSON, and Markdown formats.
longDescription: Demonstrates how to use Dev Proxy to track and analyze API usage patterns, showing which endpoints are used most frequently with reports in plain text, JSON, and Markdown formats.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy tracking API usage analytics

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.

references.name: Record and export proxy activity
references.description: Learn how to record and export proxy activity using Dev Proxy.
